scripts.postinstall: npm run beforesetup-src && npm run setup-src && npm run aftersetup-src && npm run setup-pkgs
scripts.setup-src: cd src && cd cli && npm i --omit=optional && npm run bundle
scripts.version:unix: (cd pkgs && npm version $npm_package_version) && (cd src/cli && npm version $npm_package_version) && git add .
scripts.version:windows: cd pkgs && npm version %npm_package_version% && cd .. && cd src && cd cli && npm version %npm_package_version% && cd .. && cd .. && git add .
scripts.dryrun: (export TAGNAME=DRYRUN.$(date +%Y-%m-%d.%H.%M.%S); echo $TAGNAME >> .logs/dryruns.log && git add .logs/dryruns.log && git commit -m $TAGNAME && git tag -a $TAGNAME -m 'publish dry-run' && git push --follow-tags)
